mapper.select: select pcode,pstock,pname,pprice from product where pcode = #{pcode}
mapper.update: update product pro, orderr ord set pstock = (select (pstock - #{ocount}) as total from product where pcode = #{oday}), ord.sdate = now(), ord.scount = #{ocount}, ord.osuju = '출고 요청 확인', ord.sdel ='출고 중', ord.amount =#{amount} where ord.ono = #{ono} and pcode= #{oday};
mapper.select: select sdate from orderr where ono = #{ono};
mapper.update: update orderr set osuju = "견적서 발행" where ono =#{ono};
mapper.select: select amount,a.ono, oday, pcode, sdate, uuid, a.cname,pproduct,ocount,scount,osuju,otext,x,y,sdel from orderr a join connection b join product c on a.cname = b.cname and a.pproduct = c.pname order by a.ono asc;
